      Classes in eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base that implement Transaction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  BufferingTransaction
      A Transaction decorator providing buffering capability.
      (package private) class  ContextEnforcingTransaction
      A Transaction decorator reformulating operations targeted at the null context and preventing writing to inferred contexts.
      (package private) class  DebuggingTransaction 
      class  ForwardingTransaction
      Implementation of Transaction that forwards by default all method calls to a delegate Transaction.
      (package private) class  SynchronizedTransaction
      A Transaction decorator handling operation synchronization and transaction auto-commit, auto-closure, maximum execution and idle times.
      (package private) class  UnmodifiableTransaction
